title: wallet relying party request object header
description: Wallet relying party request object header

typ.description: A field with the value jwt

alg.description: An identifier for a JWS asymmetric digital signature algorithm. It MUST NOT be none or an identifier for a symmetric algorithm

kid.description: An identifier that refers to a specific public key of the private key used to sign the request object. This is used, for instance, to choose among a set of keys within a JWK Set
